The next generation of the web

HEY EVERYONE!

Unlock the power of decentralized technology and become a leader in the next generation of web development. Join us in the world of web3, where you'll learn how to create dApps on blockchain platforms, write smart contracts, and tap into the full potential of decentralized networks. Don't just be a part of the future, shape it. Enroll in our web3 development course today!

CURRICULUM

Introduction to blockchain technology and Ethereum basics

  • Overview of blockchain technology
  • Ethereum network and its features
  • Smart contracts and decentralized applications (DApps)

Setting up a development environment

  • Installing and setting up an Ethereum client (e.g. Geth or Parity)
  • Introduction to Trufï¬‚e and Ganache for smart contract development
  • Setting up a private blockchain network for testing

Smart contract development

  • Solidity programming basics
  • Writing and deploying smart contracts
  • Interacting with smart contracts using web3.js

Decentralized applications (DApps) development

  • Building a simple DApp using web3.js and React
  • Understanding web3 providers and connecting to the Ethereum network
  • Testing and deploying DApps on the Ethereum network

Advanced topics and hands-on project

  • ERC20 and ERC721 token standards
  • Understanding Ethereum's consensus mechanism (Proof-of-Work)
  • Introduction to Ethereum 2.0 and its features
  • Hands-on project to build a more advanced DApp or smart contract-Best practices and considerations for production deployment
